We visited Pune on the day 26th August for one day and stayed in The Central Park Hotel- Bund Garden Road- Pune.
We received truly exceptional service from the front desk team. They were so helpful.
This was a relaxing and enjoyable experience, and we will definitely recommend your hotel " The Central Park Hotel - Bund Garden Road-Pune" to friends and family.
The room was beyond comfortable, and we really appreciated the attention to detail.
The amenities, like the complimentary breakfast, added so much value to our stay.  We loved the comfortable beds and the high-quality linens; it made for a perfect  night's sleep.
Your staff's professionalism and kindness made our stay so pleasant, specially Mr. Nainesh (Guest Relation Manager)  & Mr. Santa Cruz. (Trip Advisor).
Thank you very much for complimentary dinner as a gift to us from you.

text.text:
The hotel is being run by an amazing team of people right from the guys at the gate (security guys), at reception, restaurant and the housekeeping staff (who rarely get mentioned in any hotel reviews). The team is well coordinated.

The team goes extra mile to ensure your stay is comfortable and displays warm hospitality. Kudos to the whole team.

In short if I have to use a single word to describe the team... It ll be probably INCREDIBLE

They ll go extra mile to make to feel at Home.

Rooms

The rooms are spacious and available with all basic amenities expected in a room. There is a mini fridge available. No issues absolutely. Their is newspaper/magazines/snacks/tea pot with essentials etc etc available and replaced on a regular basis and as and when required. In fact they ll always put some extra/additional items for your comfort and utility.

Food

The restaurant serves amazing 🤩 food and a great spread. The chef's at live counters are extremely friendly and they ll make any dish you require. The team at restaurant is welcoming and displays warmth hospitality

Would highly recommend a stay.  🎯

Some observations for management -

a) Rooms on 6th floor lack proper sound proofing and you can hear TV sounds played by adjacent room. This needs to be addressed. It just requires installing sound proofing materials in between rooms. However no such issues in other floors.

b) Gym, Spa and swimming are available on 6th floor. In my opinion, the Gym needs an upgrade. It is located in a smaller sized area. They should upgrade their gym with additional treadmills and additional multi gym.

text.text:
I stayed for two nights. There is nothing great to mention about the hospitality and the services. The rooms are decent for the charges and the facilities provided.It is a good hotel to stay for business overnight stay if the area of interest is within the Pune Camp area. What upset me was that I was allotted a renovated room and there was renovation still going on in the floor which was a messy affair.The renovated rooms had a funny interior setup which I wonder if it would be appreciated by the majority guests.
Nothing great about all the other services highlighted by the Hotel.
The hypocrisy of the Hotel also came to display when they were planning Independence celebration in the morning hours and few of my war veterans/armed forces friends came to meet me but they could not offer the basic hospitality to them and I had to take them to the Coffee shop at nearby INOX  to have a cup of Coffee. The only facility available @ 9am to host my guests on Independence Day was the buffet breakfast  and no provision to offer any Coffee to guests.I brought this to the notice of the Senior Lady in the counter but she had an indifferent attitude.
God Bless such Hypocrisy.

text.text:
Writing the review after staying for 11 days...
Rooms :
Rooms are good... They are just good, a lot smaller than what I had expected and don't feel worthy for the amount you pay to stay at the hotel... They are not that luxurious.

Service :
Room service : The treatment at the hotel is good. The room cleaning service is fine. The hospitality is really well managed. All the feedback is well considered and made sure that they are followed well and respected.

Laundry Service : The laundry and pressing are the worst services, there are high chances of clothes getting spoiled after the wash and pressing... I lost 2 of my t-shirts.

Complimentary pickup and drop-off to office is very well managed and right on-time always.

Food :
Best for Breakfast - Idli, Poha, Fruits... Parathas and Dosas from the live counter are served hot and taste authentic. English breakfast option is also made available and croissant 🥐, beans, scrambled eggs, cakes and lot other options are available.
Best for In Room Dining - Peas masala, Dhal Tadka, Panner tandoori are served well and taste great Babycorn pepper dry (not in the menu) but the chef custom made this for me and it was great.

Sathyam, one of the hotel staffs is a very good person who treats you well, does his job professionally well.

A big thank you to all the staff members for their warm hospitality and excellent service—special thanks to Nirmala, Trishna for making excellent tea, Dhamji for his attentive service, Suraj for keeping the room spotless and well-serviced, and Siddhi at the reception for her friendly and helpful assistance.

Highly recommended!

We recently hosted a family get-together, Rakhi and birthday celebration at Sorina Hillside Resort in Pune, and it was a wonderful experience.

The property was clean and well maintained throughout the day. The children enjoyed themselves between the open lawns and the pool, while the adults had a chance to relax and catch up. The food was fresh, flavorful, and well received by all our guests. The staff deserves special mention—they were extremely attentive, well organized, and handled every request with a smile, including last‑minute changes.

Thanks to their efforts, the event went off smoothly and was truly enjoyable for everyone. I’d highly recommend Sorina for family gatherings or group events.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Parc Estique Hotel, Viman Nagar, from June 29 to July 1, 2025, in Room No. 525, and I would like to share my feedback.

Firstly, the positives:

The reception staff was extremely humble and supportive, making the check-in and overall experience very pleasant.

The restaurant service was commendable, with delicious food and courteous staff.

The room ambiance was excellent – it was well-scented, had a great view, and was kept tidy.

Room service was prompt, and the staff were polite and professional.

It was also appreciated that the room was stocked with a sufficient number of water bottles.

Areas for improvement:

There was no handwash provided in the bathroom, which is a basic hygiene requirement.

Shampoo and body wash supplies were insufficient for the duration of the stay.

A safety concern: where the wooden and tile flooring meet, a nail was protruding from the floor. Unfortunately, I injured myself twice due to this and had to take a tetanus injection as a precaution.

I hope these points are taken in the right spirit to improve the overall guest experience. Despite the mentioned issues, I appreciate the hospitality and look forward to better arrangements on my next visit.

editorialSummary.text: Polished property in a shopping & entertainment complex, offering a gym, a spa & a rooftop pool.

text.text:
Disappointing Stay – Not Worth the 5-Star Tag

I stayed at E-Square The Fern, Pune with my wife and daughter from August 15 to 17, 2025, and unfortunately, the experience was far from what one would expect from a hotel claiming to be 5-star.

Here are the key issues we faced:

Limited Food Options: The breakfast and dinner buffet had very limited variety, especially for vegetarians. The dinner buffet felt overpriced considering the lack of options and quality.
Remote Location: The hotel is located on the outskirts and is not well-known even among locals, making commuting and navigation inconvenient.
Swimming Pool Not Functional: One of the main reasons we chose this hotel was the swimming pool, which was non-operational during our stay. This was extremely disappointing, especially since I had promised my daughter a fun pool experience. I had to alter our plans last minute and spend extra money to take my family to a water park instead.
Poor Housekeeping Service: Despite turning on the “Make My Room” sign before leaving, the room was not cleaned. I had to call housekeeping after returning. Additionally, the staff left an empty glass outside our room, saying it was from the restaurant and someone else would pick it up. It remained there until we checked out the next morning.
Overall Verdict: With the kind of service and amenities provided, this hotel does not deserve a 5-star rating. At best, it should be rated 3 or 3.5 stars. I would not recommend it for families expecting a premium experience.

text.text:
Had a pleasant stay at The E-Square The Fern Hotel in Pune, and it's definitely a place I’d recommend for both business and leisure travelers.

🔹 Location:
Centrally located and well-connected to key parts of the city. The hotel is part of the E-Square complex, which includes a cinema, eateries, and shopping outlets — a big plus for convenience and entertainment.

🔹 Rooms:
Spacious, clean, and thoughtfully designed. The beds were comfortable, and the in-room amenities were modern and functional. Wi-Fi speed was decent, and housekeeping was prompt.

🔹 Dining:
The breakfast buffet had a wide variety of Indian and continental options. Everything was fresh and well-prepared. Their in-house dining menu is also worth trying, especially if you're looking to unwind without stepping out.

🔹 Service:
The staff was courteous and helpful throughout the stay. Check-in and check-out were smooth, though there could be a bit more attentiveness at peak times.

🔹 Ambience:
The overall vibe is modern yet relaxed. The hotel strikes a good balance between a business-friendly environment and a comfortable leisure stay.

We recently stayed at **Hotel Aurora Towers** during our visit to Pune, and it was a truly pleasant experience. Located conveniently on **MG Road near West End Theatre**, the hotel offers both comfort and accessibility, making it ideal for families and travelers alike.

The hotel is **immaculately clean, tidy, and well-maintained**. From the lobby to the rooms, everything was spotless. The **housekeeping staff deserves special mention** for their consistent efforts in maintaining hygiene and cleanliness throughout our stay.

Our room was spacious and comfortable, with all the necessary amenities. The **room service was prompt**, and the food served was not only **tasty but also kid-friendly**, which made dining in very convenient for our family. The staff was **courteous, attentive, and always ready to help**, adding to the overall positive experience.

Aurora Towers also features a **well-equipped gym and a clean swimming pool**, perfect for relaxing or keeping up with your fitness routine while traveling.

Overall, we had a wonderful stay and would **highly recommend Hotel Aurora Towers** to anyone visiting Pune. Whether you're traveling with family or on a business trip, this hotel offers great value, excellent service, and a prime location in the heart of the city.

text.text:
A Peaceful Retreat at The Fernery Cafe, Hotel Aurora Towers, Pune

Stepping into The Fernery Cafe at Hotel Aurora Towers feels like discovering a hidden gem in the heart of Pune. This all-night cafe truly lives up to its reputation as a calm, quiet, and peaceful haven, making it an ideal spot for a relaxed meal or late-night coffee.

One of the oldest establishments of its kind, The Fernery boasts a wonderful ambiance that exudes comfort and tranquility. The spacious layout, tasteful decor with warm lighting, and well-arranged seating create an inviting atmosphere perfect for quiet conversations or simply unwinding.

Beyond the serene setting, the food is consistently good, offering a satisfying culinary experience. Coupled with its great central location, The Fernery Cafe is a highly recommended destination for anyone seeking a peaceful escape with quality food and a truly pleasant environment in Pune.
They do buffet breakfast at Rs450 for all walkin and guests with a large range of offering !

text.text:
1. Toilets are old , plumbing need to be upgraded. Toilet seat is half broken. Out of 4 days only one day proper hot water was available.
2. Food is very poor. Ingredients are good but they lack cooking ability. As simple as idli, they can not make good, it was hard and in some idli, it was very hard at edges. We ordered masalabhaat, it was really poor. They don't have any maharashtrian menu.
3. First night some kind of humming noise was in room almost full night.

Has a good potential to be a good hotel, need improvisation.
Don't think it is cheaper.

text.text:
I traveled to India in the month of July, and staying at this hotel was truly one of the best decisions I made. I was extremely stressed about the work I had to get done and I had been travelling for 9 hours, but the moment i finally got to the hotel it was such a breath of fresh air. For starters, the staff is so SO friendly, helpful and accommodating. I believe it was Atul and another gentleman whose name I unfortunately can't remember who greeted us at reception, and the check in process was quick.

Please keep in mind they have the European plug points, for which I hadnt come prepared. The staff was so incredibly kind that one of staff members went out of their way to accompany us to a shop that had this plug point at 7ish in the night. They didn't have to do that, and yet they did.

On check out day I was struggling to find a cab at 5.30 am. All the staff that was gathered there assured me and reassured me that they will make sure we find a cab. They even went to the extent of saying if we don't have a cab, one of the staff from the security team who has a tuk will take us to the airport 🥹 I can't tell you what a kind staff this hotel has and how helpful they were.

They even sort out breakfast packs for you if you're unable to stay for breakfast which was the case for me on a few days. If flew twice to India and I chose Cocoon hotel without any doubt on my second trip as well because their customer service and hotel over all is FANTASTIC.

The rooms are almost like a suite, because you additionally have a kitchen and an attached sitting area with a balcony as well. The beds are incredibly comfortable!

Few things they could improve on would be to have a wider variety of food for the buffet. Their food was more vegetarian based, and the number of dishes at the buffet was limited.

Their alacarte menu though is really good. I highly recommend their cold coffee and chicken biryani.

One day upon request they even sent  tomato soup from the dinner buffet up to my room, even though I had just eaten from the buffet lol.

Also the entire hotel is sparkling clean, which was truly refreshing to see.

They could have a better selection of shampoos and conditioners as toiletries, because on the bottle it said 'shampoo and conditioner'.

Over all, I will confidently recommend this hotel to anyone any day. They made my stay in Pune one of the most restful trips given that I was in India for some stressful work. Their staff, the gentleman who carried our bags to the rooms, the security team, Atul, Arjun (if I got his name correctly) and the rest of the team at reception were nothing short of fantastic. I don't understand how there are negative reviews on this hotel, because their kindness, prifessionalism, service was amazing. I'm a very picky person that isn't generous with good reviews, unless it was really good; and this place was par excellence. Cocoon hotel Pune, your staff deserves a raise.

text.text:
Deeply Disappointed - Unacceptable Hospitality at Amanora The Fern

My experience at Amanora The Fern was incredibly frustrating and disappointing. Across multiple incidents, the lack of professionalism and care from the staff was glaring and what's worse, no real action was taken, even after we brought everything to their attention.

Starting with the food: we ordered breakfast twice, asking for fried eggs and toast. The first time, the bread was not toasted at all. The second time, it came burnt. I had also asked for a portion of mushrooms, which arrived soaked in water, making them completely inedible. The tea was cold both times, we ended up not touching the food at all.

Later that night, we ordered a brownie and confirmed with the chef that it contained no nuts, as I have a nut allergy. He assured us it didn’t. But when the brownie arrived, it was filled with nuts. I had an allergic reaction and had to take medication in the middle of the night. This level of carelessness is unacceptable and honestly dangerous.

The worst, however, was the blatant violation of privacy. Despite the Do Not Disturb sign being on, the staff kept knocking, ringing the bell and even entered the room while I was inside alone and in the washroom. This is absolutely unacceptable behaviour.

To top it off, the next morning at 8 a.m the housekeeping woke us up by knocking and ringing the bell again, saying it was checkout time. Our checkout wasn’t due yet and they later admitted it was a mistake meant for another room.

Even after all of these incidents not a single manager checked in with us. No one attempted to take responsibility or offer any kind of gesture not even a complimentary item, discount or genuine effort to fix things. Just a casual “sorry” during checkout, as if all of this was normal.

I find this level of service shocking from a hotel under The Fern brand. The staff clearly lacks training, professionalism and basic courtesy. I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone. Completely unacceptable experience. Please save yourself the money and time!!!!!

text.text:
Our stay at Amanora The Fern was nothing short of magical, a night that will forever be etched in our hearts as the best of our lives. The service was impeccable, delivered with such genuine warmth and attentiveness that it felt like the staff were personally invested in making our moment unforgettable. They went above and beyond, surprising us with a bottle of chilled champagne and two elegant glasses as per our special request, and the beautifully decorated bed was a touching masterpiece that made our hearts skip a beat. Every interaction with the team was infused with kindness, transforming our stay into the perfect start to a new chapter.

The food was an absolute delight, elevating our experience to new heights. The chicken stroganoff was a creamy, savory triumph, perfectly balanced and bursting with flavor in every bite. The hot chocolate was a warm, indulgent hug in a mug, rich and comforting, exactly what we needed to cozy up our evening. The rasmalai was divine—soft, spongy, and soaked in a delicately sweet saffron-infused milk that melted in our mouths. And the scoop of vanilla ice cream? Silky, classic, and the perfect sweet note to end our meal. Each dish was crafted with care, making every bite a celebration of taste and texture.

Our room, with its stunning view of the vibrant boulevard, was the ideal backdrop to this unforgettable night. Amanora The Fern didn’t just provide a stay; they created a memory we’ll never let slip from our minds. To the exceptional team, thank you for your outstanding service, culinary brilliance, and for making our night so extraordinarily special. We’ll return, not just for the luxury, but for the love and care you pour into every detail.

text.text:
My recent stay at Corinthians Resort & Club was an absolutely delightful experience from start to finish. The property is lush, well-maintained, and offers a peaceful escape from the city's hustle.

While the amenities and rooms were excellent, what truly made our stay memorable was the outstanding service, particularly from Ms. Kopila Biswakarma, the Restaurant Manager.

From the moment we walked into the dining area, her warm and genuine smile set the tone. She is the epitome of professionalism and grace. She not only ensured that every meal was seamless but also went above and beyond to personalize our experience. text.text:
Location:
Shantai Hotel is situated in a prime location, not far from the railway station, making it convenient for travelers.

Room & Cleanliness:
The room was spacious and well-maintained. The toilet was clean, which is a crucial factor in ensuring a comfortable stay. However, there was an issue with the bed allocation. Despite requesting a room with a single bed, I was given a room with two separate beds, and the reception staff was unhelpful and somewhat rude, which negatively impacted my first impression of the hotel.

Food & Dining Experience:
The in-room dining service was satisfactory. I ordered Chicken Satay and Chicken Burnt Garlic Rice, both of which were of good quality and had a well-balanced mix of flavors. The taste and presentation met expectations.

Service:
While the housekeeping and food quality were commendable, the front desk service left much to be desired. The unaccommodating attitude of the reception staff affected the overall experience.

editorialSummary.text: Plush quarters in a swanky hotel offering restaurants & bars, plus a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
Truly 5-Star – Worth Every Penny!

We had a bill of around ₹15,000 for our group of three at the restaurant — and honestly, it was worth every rupee. The food, the service, and the ambience completely justify the price.

The terrace lounge stole our hearts — what a stunning view! From the moment we entered, everything felt magical. The rooms are luxurious with polished doors, premium wardrobes, and an absolutely beautiful washroom that feels like a spa. The hall features a gorgeous jhoomar, and there are fresh flowers everywhere, even in the washrooms — such attention to detail!

A special touch: the foreigner lady playing the violin — her music just takes your heart away. Whether it’s the view of the swimming pool or the elegance of every corner, this place delivers a truly unforgettable experience.

Highly recommended for those who want luxury, charm, and class in one place.

text.text:
Exceptional Experience at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune

Our recent stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune was nothing short of exceptional. We were there to celebrate a special family occasion — my sister’s 40th birthday — and the experience was made truly memorable thanks to the thoughtful and attentive team at the hotel.

From the very beginning, *Jui* ensured everything was seamless. Her efforts in curating surprises and making my sister feel special were deeply appreciated. It’s rare to see this level of care and personal attention, and it meant a lot to all of us.

The hospitality throughout the property was top-notch — warm, inclusive, and genuinely attentive. A special shoutout to *Chetan* and *Rupesh* at *Three Kitchens* restaurant, who made our dining experience wonderful with their kind service and attention to detail.

And our little 7-year-old absolutely loved the experience! He came back with fond memories — and even a sweet little gift from the hotel that he now treasures.

Every element — the comfort, the service, the food, and the warmth — reflected the Ritz-Carlton standard in the best way possible.

text.text:
I am currently staying at your property and would like to raise a formal complaint regarding the extremely uncomfortable conditions I’ve been facing.

Firstly, the initial room assigned to me had loud music coming from a pub located at the back of the hotel. I requested a change to a quieter room, and while the staff acknowledged that this is a known issue, I was told no action can be taken against the pub due to fear of conflict with the owner. This is extremely disappointing, as it directly impacts guests’ ability to rest.

The second room I was provided is only marginally better in terms of noise. However, it has a severe issue with water dripping from the AC unit, which is both annoying and unhygienic. Despite raising the matter, I was asked to "adjust"—something I find unreasonable, especially given that proper sleep and comfort are the most basic expectations from a hotel stay.

I am still struggling to get a good night's sleep and resolve this issue, and I request immediate intervention to:

Either provide a comfortable room without these issues,

Or offer a partial refund/compensation for this unacceptable experience.

I hope this matter will be treated with the urgency and seriousness it deserves. I look forward to a quick resolution.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Radisson Blu, and I must say, the hospitality and service were truly exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcomed and well cared for. Check-in was smooth and efficient, and every staff member I encountered was polite, professional, and eager to assist.

The room was clean, well-maintained, and thoughtfully equipped with everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Housekeeping did a fantastic job every day, and the attention to detail really stood out.

What impressed me most was the personalized service. Whether it was a quick response to a room request, helpful local recommendations, or the warm greetings throughout the hotel, it was clear that customer satisfaction is a top priority.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Central Park Hotel in Koregaon Park, Pune, and I must say it was an outstanding experience. The hospitality provided by the hotel staff was truly excellent. Right from the moment I arrived, I was greeted warmly and was pleasantly surprised to receive a room upgrade, which made my stay even more delightful.

The hotel's staff, especially Sumit, the General Manager, Sujit, the Operations Manager, Jagdish, the Food and Beverage Manager, and the servers Ajay, Raju, and RajShankar, were all incredibly helpful and accommodating. Their attention to detail and willingness to go the extra mile for guests truly stood out.

The room I stayed in was amazing, offering a perfect blend of comfort and luxury. The hotel's cleanliness and well-maintained facilities added to the overall positive experience.

One of the highlights of my stay was the exceptional food at the hotel. The culinary offerings were simply outstanding. The breakfast and dinner options provided a wide variety, catering to different tastes and preferences. The quality and taste of the food were top-notch, making every meal a delightful experience.

In summary, Central Park Hotel Koregaon Park, Pune, offers not only excellent hospitality but also a luxurious and comfortable stay. With its attentive staff, delicious cuisine, and impeccable cleanliness, this hotel truly exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable and enjoyable stay in Pune.

text.text:
*5/5 Stars*

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Radisson Blu for almost 20 days and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish! The hotel's modern amenities, impeccable cleanliness, and comfortable rooms made for a wonderful stay.

I had my wedding reception in the hotel's banquet hall and the food they provided was delicious

However, what truly made our stay stand out was the outstanding service provided by the hotel staff. From the warm welcome at check-in to the helpful concierge team, every interaction was met with a smile and a willingness to assist.
We did had some issues with key access that the staff was quickley resolved

The hotel's restaurant/bar was also a highlight, serving delicious food/drinks in a cozy and inviting atmosphere.

I would highly recommend Radisson Blu to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The combination of excellent facilities and top-notch service makes it a true gem.

Thank you to the entire team at Radisson Blu for making our stay so memorable!"

A special thanks to Mr Flavian Clayton who took care of all bookings and requirements.
Mr Akshay kumar Sahoo was also polite and helpful
Grateful to cleaning staff Utkarsh and team

*Rating Breakdown:*

- Cleanliness: 5/5
- Comfort: 5/5
- Service: 5/5
- Facilities: 5/5
- Value: 5/5

"I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Radisson Blu Pune Kharadi, and it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality by akansha. The check-in process was seamless, and she was incredibly courteous and attentive throughout my stay.

The room was spacious, modern, and impeccably clean, providing a perfect retreat after a long day of exploring Pune. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep, and the amenities provided added an extra touch of luxury to my stay.

One of the highlights of my experience was the dining options at the hotel. The breakfast buffet offered an impressive spread of both local and international cuisines, catering to all tastes and preferences. Service was immense by Parth, Aniket, Nitin and Tejaswini. Additionally, I had the opportunity to dine at the The kabab factory restaurant, where I was treated to delicious dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients by chef Zameer.

The hotel's location in Kharadi is also worth mentioning, as it provides easy access to both the business district and popular tourist attractions. Whether you're visiting Pune for business or leisure, the Radisson Blu Pune Kharadi is the perfect choice for a memorable stay.

Overall, I highly recommend the Radisson Blu Pune Kharadi to anyone looking for a comfortable, luxurious, and conveniently located hotel in Pune. The impeccable service, modern amenities, and attention to detail truly set it apart from the rest."

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Sorina Hillside Resort in Panshet, Pune, and I must say that it was a delightful retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life. Surrounded by lush green hills and offering breathtaking views, this resort provided a serene and peaceful environment that rejuvenated my mind and soul.
The resort staff was courteous, friendly, and always ready to assist. From the moment I arrived, I felt welcomed and well taken care of. They were attentive to my needs and provided prompt service throughout my stay. The level of professionalism exhibited by the staff was commendable, adding to the overall positive experience.
One of the highlights of my stay was the food at Sorina Hillside Resort. The on-site restaurant served a variety of delicious dishes, prepared with fresh ingredients. The flavors were authentic and mouthwatering, and the dining experience was enhanced by the stunning views from the restaurant.
The resort's amenities were well-maintained and catered to various interests. I particularly enjoyed the swimming pool, which provided a refreshing escape from the summer heat.
Although my overall experience at Sorina Hillside Resort was exceptional, there were a few areas that could be improved. Firstly, the Wi-Fi connectivity was a bit weak and inconsistent, which may be a concern for some guests. Secondly, the resort's location, while offering tranquility, is slightly remote, making it necessary to plan ahead for transportation and sightseeing.
In conclusion, Sorina Hillside Resort in Panshet, Pune, provided a memorable escape into nature. With its breathtaking views, comfortable accommodations, friendly staff, and delicious food, it offered an idyllic setting for relaxation and rejuvenation. Despite minor areas for improvement, I highly recommend this resort to anyone seeking a peaceful retreat

text.text:
I recently stayed at your hotel for 7 days. While I truly appreciated the warm hospitality and courteous service from your staff, I would like to share a few areas of improvement for your consideration:
•	The hotel room, and especially the bathroom, felt quite cramped. The bathroom size and layout were very uncomfortable, giving the feeling of a railway washroom, which was quite unexpected from a hotel of your brand.
•	The breakfast menu was repetitive every day — mostly the same items like sambhar, idli, and poha. I was expecting more variety and better quality as per the standards your brand usually represents.

That said, I would like to sincerely thank your staff for their friendly behavior and prompt service throughout our stay. Their positive attitude truly made our experience more comfortable.

Looking forward to seeing some improvements, and I hope to have an even better stay next time.

text.text:
Had a pleasant stay at The E-Square The Fern Hotel in Pune, and it's definitely a place I’d recommend for both business and leisure travelers.

🔹 Location:
Centrally located and well-connected to key parts of the city. The hotel is part of the E-Square complex, which includes a cinema, eateries, and shopping outlets — a big plus for convenience and entertainment.

🔹 Rooms:
Spacious, clean, and thoughtfully designed. The beds were comfortable, and the in-room amenities were modern and functional. Wi-Fi speed was decent, and housekeeping was prompt.

🔹 Dining:
The breakfast buffet had a wide variety of Indian and continental options. Everything was fresh and well-prepared. Their in-house dining menu is also worth trying, especially if you're looking to unwind without stepping out.

🔹 Service:
The staff was courteous and helpful throughout the stay. Check-in and check-out were smooth, though there could be a bit more attentiveness at peak times.

🔹 Ambience:
The overall vibe is modern yet relaxed. The hotel strikes a good balance between a business-friendly environment and a comfortable leisure stay.

From the ease of accessibility to the lavish rooms and mesmerizing rooftop scenes, The Fern Hotel in Pune provides a comprehensive and delightful stay, catering to both leisure and business travelers with finesse.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Blue diamond, Pune. From the moment I stepped into the lobby until the day of my departure, my experience at this hotel was nothing short of exceptional.

The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and Neha at the front desk welcomed us warmly. She provided me with all the necessary information about the hotel's amenities, dining options, and local attractions. The staff's professionalism and friendliness were consistent throughout my stay, making me feel valued as a guest. They also upgraded us to the Seleqtions suite which we felt was a great gesture.

The Suite was simply stunning! It was spacious, elegantly decorated, and equipped with modern amenities. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep and the room's cleanliness and attention to detail were impeccable, a true testament to the hotel's commitment to excellence.

The location of Blue Diamond couldn't be better. It was conveniently situated in Koregaon Park near major attractions and within walking distance of shopping districts and local restaurants. I appreciated being able to explore the city easily and return to the comfort of the hotel without any hassle.

The buffet was also great with a wide spread. In summary, my stay at Blue Diamond was nothing short of extraordinary. The combination of excellent service, luxurious accommodations, delectable dining options, and prime location made it a memorable experience. Ill recommend this hotel if you are visiting Pune.

text.text:
My recent stay at Blue Diamond, Pune - IHCL SeleQtions, was a delightful escape into luxury. From the moment I entered the hotel, its contemporary design and meticulous attention to detail set the stage for an exceptional experience.

The Deluxe Suite, my chosen abode, was a haven of comfort and sophistication. The spacious layout, plush furnishings, and panoramic city views created a memorable retreat. The bed, enveloped in comfort, ensured a restful night, while the well-appointed bathroom with premium amenities added to the sense of opulence.

Dining at Blue Diamond was a culinary journey. Whispering Bamboo, the fine-dining Asian restaurant, offered exquisite flavors and impeccable presentation, while Latitude, the all-day dining restaurant, impressed with a diverse breakfast spread.

Service at Blue Diamond was exemplary. The staff, consistently professional and welcoming, made every interaction a pleasure. From insightful local recommendations by the concierge to the unwavering commitment of the housekeeping team, the service was impeccable.

The wellness facilities, including the well-equipped fitness center and rejuvenating spa, complemented the overall experience. The spa provided a tranquil escape, leaving me refreshed after a day exploring Pune.

Centrally located, Blue Diamond offers easy access to key attractions, shopping districts, and business centers. Whether for business or leisure, the hotel's prime location enhances its appeal.

The seamless blend of elegance, comfort, and top-notch service makes it an excellent choice for discerning travelers. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel for a luxurious and memorable stay in Pune and look forward to returning on future visits.

text.text:
I recently visited this hotel for an official meeting and had a comfortable and satisfying experience overall. The hotel is well-located and offers good facilities, making it a convenient choice for business travelers and tourists alike.

Location & Accessibility

One of the biggest advantages of this hotel is its prime location. It is centrally situated, making it easy to access from different parts of the city. The railway station is just 3-4 km away, which is a big plus for travelers arriving by train. Additionally, since the hotel is located on the main road, transportation options such as taxis, auto-rickshaws, and public buses are easily available.

Ambience & Reception

The hotel’s ambience is quite impressive, with well-maintained interiors and a peaceful environment. As soon as you enter, you are welcomed by a decent and elegant reception area. The front desk staff is very professional, friendly, and always ready to assist with a smile. Their warm hospitality makes the check-in process smooth and hassle-free.

Service & Parking

The valet parking service is available, which is helpful, but the parking area is quite limited and a bit congested. The security and valet staff, however, are quick to assist and ensure that guests don’t face any issues while parking their vehicles.

Food & Dining Experience

One of the highlights of this hotel is its superb food quality. The taste is excellent, and the variety of dishes offered is impressive. Whether you are dining in the restaurant or ordering room service, the food is well-prepared and delicious.

Final Verdict

Overall, this hotel offers a great combination of convenience, comfort, and good service. While the parking space is limited, the prime location, welcoming staff, and excellent food make it a great choice for travelers.

text.text:
Hotel Review: Cocoon Hotel

My recent stay at Cocoon Hotel was a pleasant and comfortable experience, offering a blend of modern amenities and thoughtful service in a convenient location.

Accommodation: The room at Cocoon Hotel was stylishly designed with a contemporary aesthetic. It was clean, well-maintained, and equipped with all essential amenities for a comfortable stay. The bed was particularly comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep after a long day of activities.

Service: The staff at Cocoon Hotel were friendly, professional, and attentive throughout my stay. From the smooth check-in process to prompt room service requests, their hospitality was commendable and added to the overall positive experience.

Dining: The hotel's restaurant offered a diverse menu with both local and international dishes. The breakfast buffet was satisfying with a variety of options to cater to different tastes. The quality of food was excellent, and the dining experience was enjoyable.

Facilities: Cocoon Hotel provided excellent facilities including a well-equipped gym and a relaxing spa. The fitness center had modern equipment suitable for various workout routines, while the spa offered a range of treatments that were perfect for unwinding and rejuvenating.

Location: Situated in a central location, Cocoon Hotel was convenient for both business and leisure travelers. It was close to key attractions, shopping areas, and public transportation, making it easy to explore the city.

Overall Experience: Cocoon Hotel offered a comfortable and enjoyable stay with its modern facilities, attentive service, and convenient location. Whether for a business trip or a leisurely vacation, the hotel provided a welcoming ambiance and all the amenities needed for a memorable stay.

Hotel staff : RANJAN JANA , MANIKA HALDER, GANESH were very corporative in every aspects.

text.text:
Our stay at Amanora The Fern was nothing short of magical, a night that will forever be etched in our hearts as the best of our lives. The service was impeccable, delivered with such genuine warmth and attentiveness that it felt like the staff were personally invested in making our moment unforgettable. They went above and beyond, surprising us with a bottle of chilled champagne and two elegant glasses as per our special request, and the beautifully decorated bed was a touching masterpiece that made our hearts skip a beat. Every interaction with the team was infused with kindness, transforming our stay into the perfect start to a new chapter.

The food was an absolute delight, elevating our experience to new heights. The chicken stroganoff was a creamy, savory triumph, perfectly balanced and bursting with flavor in every bite. The hot chocolate was a warm, indulgent hug in a mug, rich and comforting, exactly what we needed to cozy up our evening. The rasmalai was divine—soft, spongy, and soaked in a delicately sweet saffron-infused milk that melted in our mouths. And the scoop of vanilla ice cream? Silky, classic, and the perfect sweet note to end our meal. Each dish was crafted with care, making every bite a celebration of taste and texture.

Our room, with its stunning view of the vibrant boulevard, was the ideal backdrop to this unforgettable night. Amanora The Fern didn’t just provide a stay; they created a memory we’ll never let slip from our minds. To the exceptional team, thank you for your outstanding service, culinary brilliance, and for making our night so extraordinarily special. We’ll return, not just for the luxury, but for the love and care you pour into every detail.

The hot chocolate was a warm, indulgent hug in a mug, rich and comforting, exactly what we needed to cozy up our evening. The rasmalai was divine—soft, spongy, and soaked in a delicately sweet saffron-infused milk that melted in our mouths. And the scoop of vanilla ice cream? Silky, classic, and the perfect sweet note to end our meal. Each dish was crafted with care, making every bite a celebration of taste and texture.

Our room, with its stunning view of the vibrant boulevard, was the ideal backdrop to this unforgettable night. Amanora The Fern didn’t just provide a stay; they created a memory we’ll never let slip from our minds. To the exceptional team, thank you for your outstanding service, culinary brilliance, and for making our night so extraordinarily special. We’ll return, not just for the luxury, but for the love and care you pour into every detail.

I had a wonderful stay at Amanora The Fern Hotels & Club. From the moment I walked in, the ambiance felt serene and welcoming. The rooms are spacious, well-furnished, and extremely comfortable. The cleanliness and attention to detail were evident throughout the property.

What really stood out was the service—every staff member was polite, helpful, and attentive, making the entire experience feel personalized and warm. The food at the in-house restaurant was excellent, with a variety of options including Jain meals, which was a thoughtful touch.

The hotel’s amenities are impressive—especially the pool, gym, and the relaxing spa. Being located in Amanora Park Town, it’s also conveniently close to shopping and entertainment.

I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and peaceful stay in Pune..

text.text:
Beautiful resort in Greek and Egyptian architecture on the outskirts of Pune.
The property is huge spread across 20 acres.
The rooms that we got were  renovated, modern, spacious ,clean, and well kept.
There is a game room with few free and chargeable activities for the kids.
Board games are free, and electronic games, PSP, and VR have nominal charges.
Breakfast spread was good.
They have high tea as well with snacks, which was decent.
Special mention to the staff Mahrab at Salsa restaurant who was outstanding and courteous, where we had dined twice. Food too was very good at the Salsa restaurant with quick and prompt service.
Hotel is located almost 40-45 mins from NH 48.
The gym looked outdated and needs to be revamped.
Overall, it was a good experience, and I would highly recommend this place for the calm environment and amazing service.

text.text:
🌟 A Truly Memorable Stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune 🌟

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune, and I must say — the experience was nothing short of wonderful, awesome, and truly pleasant.

From the moment I checked in, the hospitality and service were next level. The Guest Relationship Manager warmly asked me if we were celebrating a special occasion. I casually mentioned that it was just a two-day staycation with my son during his break from JE coaching — nothing more. But to my surprise, the hotel staff made it feel like a celebration!

That evening, we were greeted with a beautiful handwritten card, warm wishes for my son, a delicious cake, and traditional Indian desserts in our room. This thoughtful gesture completely overwhelmed me with joy and gratitude. It’s rare to see such a genuine and personal touch.

Every aspect of our stay — from the impeccable cleanliness to the courtesy of every staff member, and the outstanding food and beverages — was absolutely top-notch.

A heartfelt thank you and best wishes to the amazing team at The Ritz-Carlton, Pune. You’ve set a benchmark in hospitality, and I look forward to visiting again soon!

text.text:
This hotel is designed, managed and staffed to create memorable experiences that can be scaled.

Sahil helped us with the check -in. He prioritised our requests, and took time to understand our itinerary.

We had our dinner ar their restaurant, 'Three Kitchens', where we experienced warm hospitality from every staff member. They served with a smile on their face.

Breakfast is served from very early hours in the morning and the spread has more than something for every palate. I especially liked their spread from fresh fruit juices, morning salads, vegetable dumplings, warm waffle and freshly made coffee by the in-house barista.

The spread also included the usual options from western, asian and Indian kitchens for those who are interested.

I also used their gym, steam room and sauna and loved the experiences.

Thanks Ritz Carlton for a memorable stay.

text.text:
I recently arranged a business meeting for my team at Hotel Lxia Hinjewadi, and it was a resounding success!

Here's what impressed me:

Meeting Space:The hotel provided a well-equipped banquet hall that perfectly accommodated our group size.  The space was clean, quiet, and had all the necessary audio-visual equipment to facilitate a productive discussion.
Helpful Staff:The staff at Hotel Lxia were incredibly professional and accommodating. They helped set up the meeting room beforehand and were attentive to our needs throughout the day, ensuring everything ran smoothly.
Comfortable Stay: Several team members from out of town opted to stay at the hotel. They were very happy with their rooms - clean, spacious, and with all the basic amenities needed for a comfortable stay.
Great Location:The hotel's location in Hinjewadi is convenient, with easy access to nearby restaurants and cafes for lunch breaks or after-work gatherings.

Overall, Hotel Lxia provided a perfect setting for our meeting. The combination of comfortable accommodations, professional service, and a well-equipped meeting space made it a great choice for our needs. I would definitely recommend Hotel Lxia Hinjewadi to anyone looking for a good value business hotel in Pune.

If you're looking for a place that feels like a peaceful escape right in the heart of the city, The Pune Story is a gem. The rooms are cosy, clean, and thoughtfully maintained—perfect for both short and long stays. What truly makes this place stand out is the warm and supportive staff who go out of their way to make you feel at home.

The overall vibe is quiet and calm, which makes it ideal if you're someone who prefers a relaxed atmosphere over the usual chaos of city life. And the cherry on top? The location! You're within walking distance of some of Pune’s best cafés, hangout spots, and essentials. It’s the perfect balance of comfort and convenience. Highly recommended!

text.text:
The Bombastic New Year 2023 Party at Hyatt Residency in Viman Nagar was an electrifying celebration that left attendees with unforgettable memories. The highlight of the night was undoubtedly the UK-based DJ Dhami, who skillfully curated a playlist that had the crowd dancing non-stop. His mastery of Punjabi Bhangra music made a wave of dance and ecstasy, creating an energetic atmosphere that perfectly complemented the celebratory mood.

The culinary experience was nothing short of spectacular, with a scrumptious multinational food buffet that catered to diverse tastes. From mouthwatering appetizers to delectable main courses and indulgent desserts, the menu was a gastronomic delight. The chefs at Hyatt Residency showcased their culinary expertise, ensuring that every dish was a culinary masterpiece.

To complement the delicious food, the party featured a top-of-the-line unlimited flow of liqueur. The bar staff expertly crafted a wide range of cocktails, featuring premium spirits that added a touch of sophistication to the festivities. The seamless service and attentive staff contributed to an overall ambiance of luxury and enjoyment.

The venue itself, Hyatt Residency at Viman Nagar, provided a glamorous setting for the celebration. The spacious ballroom, dazzling decor, and state-of-the-art lighting and sound systems enhanced the overall experience. The Bombastic New Year 2023 Party at Hyatt Residency was an extravagant affair that set the bar high for future celebrations, combining world-class entertainment, exquisite cuisine, and top-tier hospitality.
